metadata.synopsis: One liner for when players try to open the display cases where the rare books are. If a player repeatedly tries to get them, the librarian Tolna will be more and more agitated, ending up yelling, which will cause some furniture to explode. Further attempts will make faction hostile.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Interact with the display cases at CTY_Main_A 7; 26; -91

0.speaker: Tolna Tome-Monger
0.text: (You mustn't have heard me before: DO. NOT. TOUCH. THE TOMES.)
0.context: NodeContext: Harsh whisper; she's caught us stealing

1.speaker: Tolna Tome-Monger
1.text: (Those are rare magic tomes. No sneaky peeking!)
1.context: NodeContext: Harsh whisper; she's caught us stealing
